HPUX support

We now provide tools for the HP 9000/700 running both HPUX version 9 and version 10. We have made an effort to try to determine which version each of our HPUX customers requires; however, we expect that many of you will wish to receive one or the other. Please let us know which version you need by sending mail to production@cygnus.com, or by calling the Cygnus Support office at 800-CYGNUS-1, or by fax to 415-903-0122.
